        The number in the Pokédex occupied by this specie.

        private Type[] type
        Type of the Pokémon. Each specie can have up to two types.

      • initSprites

        private static void initSprites(java.lang.String url,
                                java.util.List<java.lang.String> urlList)
        Searches the specified url for animated sprite images.
        Parameters:
        url - String containing the URL where images should be searched
        urlList - list of URLs containing all the found images.

      • initSpriteDatabase

        private static void initSpriteDatabase()
        Initiates the search for front and back sprites in the specified URLs.

      • createImageUrl

        private javafx.scene.image.Image createImageUrl(java.lang.String url,
                                                boolean front,
                                                boolean thumbnail)
                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Loads an animated image from the specified URL. The image is loaded twice to first probe the width and height of the image. Resizing an animated image once loaded is not supported by the implemented methods.
        Parameters:
        url - String containing the URL
        front - true if the loaded image is a front sprite, false otherwise
        thumbnail - true if the requested image is going to be used for a thumbnail
        Returns:
        Image object containing the requested image
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if no image was found under this URL

      • createImage

        private javafx.scene.image.Image createImage(java.lang.String sprite,
                                             boolean align,
                                             int scaleFactor)
        Load the image from a specified resource path. If no image was found, loads the default question mark image.
        Parameters:
        sprite - sprite resource path
        align - if true aligns the image to the bottom, changes nothing otherwise
        scaleFactor - the factor used when scaling up the image
        Returns:
        Image object containing the requested image

      • createAnimImage

        private javafx.scene.image.Image createAnimImage(java.lang.String sprite,
                                                 boolean front,
                                                 boolean align,
                                                 boolean thumbnail)
        Loads the animated image from a specified resource path. If no image was found, tries to load a non-animated variant of the image.
        Parameters:
        sprite - sprite resource path
        front - should be set to true if the front image is requested, false otherwise
        align - if true aligns the image to the bottom, changes nothing otherwise
        thumbnail - true if the requested image is going to be used for a thumbnail
        Returns:
        Image object containing the requested image

      • loadSpriteImage

        private javafx.scene.image.Image loadSpriteImage(boolean front,
                                                 boolean align,
                                                 boolean thumbnail)
        Loads sprite image of the species. Depending on game settings, it can be either animated or not.
        Parameters:
        front - should be set to true if the front image is requested, false otherwise
        align - if true aligns the image to the bottom (static sprites only), changes nothing otherwise
        thumbnail - true if the requested image is going to be used for a thumbnail
        Returns:
        Image object containing the requested image

      • loadNetImage

        public void loadNetImage(boolean onlyFront)
        Loads the specie's animated sprite into memory for future use.
        Parameters:
        onlyFront - if set to true only loads the front sprite, loads both otherwise

      • unloadNetImages

        public static void unloadNetImages()
        Tries to unload the specie's animated sprite from memory.

      • searchForAnimSprite

        private void searchForAnimSprite()
        Searches for animated sprite from the previously gathered list of sprites. The method that gathers the list should be called before using this method
        See Also:
        initSpriteDatabase()

      • toggleAnimatedPokemonSprites

        public static void toggleAnimatedPokemonSprites()
        When game switches to using animated sprites, starts the search for them and finds each individual specie's sprite location.

      • setPokemonMap

        public static void setPokemonMap()
        Fills a map with currently programmed in Pokémon species.

      • resample

        public static javafx.scene.image.Image resample(javafx.scene.image.Image input,
                                                int scaleFactor)
        Scales the input image by the specified factor.
        Parameters:
        input - input image
        scaleFactor - factor by which the image is scaled
        Returns:
        scaled image

      • alignBottom

        public static javafx.scene.image.Image alignBottom(javafx.scene.image.Image input)
        Aligns all opaque elements of the image to the bottom of the image.
        Parameters:
        input - input image
        Returns:
        image after the aligning process
